message.name: ERR_FV_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MISSING
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: INF_SEARCH_NORECORDSFOUND
message.locale: There are no matching items based on the Search Criteria entered.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_ADDRESS_LINE_1_SHORT
message.locale: Address Line 1 field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_ADDRESS_LINE_2_SHORT
message.locale: Address Line 2 field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_CITY_SHORT
message.locale: City field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_LUCENE_FV_SEARCH_FIELD_START_INVALID
message.locale: The symbols added at the start of the search criteria are invalid. Only alphabetical or numerical values may be entered as the first character within search criteria.

message.name: INF_SEARCH_MAXIMUM_EXCEEDED
message.locale: Only %1n of the %2n records matching the filter criteria could be returned as there is a maximum return limit set of %3n.

message.name: INF_SEARCH_MAXIMUM_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
message.locale: All search results matching the search criteria could not be returned, as the maximum number that can be returned (%1n) has been exceeded.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_STREET_NUMBER_SHORT
message.locale: Street Number field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_STREET_NAME_SHORT
message.locale: Street Name field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_PHONE_NUMBER_MISSING
message.locale: Complete phone number details must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_FV_REFERENCE_NUMBER_SHORT
message.locale: Reference field must contain at least %1n alphanumeric character(s).
